definition: variant of 治裝|治装[zhi4 zhuang1]
adornment/to adorn/dress/clothing/costume (of an actor in a play)/to play a role/to pretend/to install/to fix/to wrap (sth in a bag)/to load/to pack
variant of 治裝費|治装费[zhi4 zhuang1 fei4]

sentences.english: How much you spend on clothing?
What is your annual budget for clothing?
sentences.chinese: 您一年在置裝上的預算大約有多少？
